review: Stick was easy to use but very slow.. Movies were always buffering.
author: Adrian Esparza

review: Very easy to set up and use. Lots of great choices.
author: Karin Klingman

review: Love it. So fast no delays at all. Just unreal to what this little stick can do!
author: Jessie Klimek

review: Looooove it!!! Why would anyone use cable now that they have the fire stick!❤️
author: Fabs

review: It has a cord and requires being plugged into an outlet to be used. If you want something that has to be plugged into the wall just use a gaming system not an oversized thumb drive.
author: alexis

review: Just received 2 days ago. Plugged it in, followed prompts and it worked flawlessly. The big test will be when it goes on vacation with me to Puerto Rico. We have wifi there so I don't anticipate a problem.
author: goldrush

review: Works well. Does just what it says it will do. I can control it with my phone. I like it.
author: Dan R
